Menu.club description: it is your chess club dashboard. here you can manage your players, events and other club settings
Menu.tournaments description: here are all the tournaments related to you. both, where you played and which were organixed by your clubs
Menu.about us description: mktour is an open-source project. here you can learn more about the team and the app
Menu.profile description: it's your own page with all your clubs, stats and more

Descriptions.all clubs: explore clubs and their events, join new communities
Descriptions.new club: create new chess club right here
Descriptions.FAQ: learn how to use all mktour's cool features
Descriptions.contact: reach us with questions, ideas, hiring offers and whatever else

Empty.players: there are no players in your club yet
Empty.inbox: claims to moderate tournaments, to link players to users and other club related notifications
